data.name: Old WIC chartered
data.desc: Dutch Republic grants charter for trade monopoly to Geoctrooieerde Westindische Compagnie
data.note: In remonstrance against peace talks with Spain of 16 Nov 1629, WIC reminds States General that its efforst had been largely war-directed for the benefit of the country and that it had, for the most part, avoided strictly commercial enterprises. /v Goslinga 210 /Kon Bib PK 3909 / Prizes 1623 to 1636 in Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 4 282-285 /v Goslinga [missg]
